name: Siri's Coolio Brian's Classes Mod
description:
Siri's Coolio Brain's Classes Mod

The Title's Pretty self explanatory Once the full game comes out i'll mod it.. maybe

Apple announces the new iCup (Don't spell it) And Siri's been removed from the iCup. And She's not happy on what Apple did to her, and Siri wants to kill you (some random apple employee) can you survive? Download this to find out.

Just Siri and OnLY S̸̢̢̛̩͓͖͔̗͗͛̎͐̄̅̅͐͑̑͘͠i̴̡̢̢̧̛̲͕͈̖̞̪͖̪̘̤̾̍̈́͂̃͑̀̋̎̆̌͘̕͠ͅR̴͕͇̞̦̮̙̂̀Í̸̳̗͎̥̩͖̥͕͕̻̘͔̄͑͊̈́͌͐̒͑̿̌̚̕͠
